article_text: was 8 years old. ‘‘My parents owned the Fair Oaks Theater in Arroyo Grande for many years. I got to see a lot of the projection.” Rodkey was the first manager to open Festival Cinemas, and currently helps manage Mission Cinemas. ‘‘I’ve been associated with just about every movie theater in this area,” he said. ‘‘If there is anything 1 don’t know I’d be surprised,” he joked. Despite the decline of the drive-in, Rodkey said he hopes to keep his doors open. ‘‘I’d hate to see the day when the drive-in doesn’t exist. It will be a sad day when the drive-in is no longer a part of American life.”
